PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS with respect to the identification and registration of tax shelters and to depreciation limits on computer software purchased to shelter income from other sources, and by introducing accelerated depreciation allowances for computer hardware and software acquired to replace non Y2K-compliant hardware and software.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2000-0248 Publication Date: 2000-07-05
Attachments
precis:
Regulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS with respect to the
identification and registration of tax shelters and to depreciation limits
on computer software purchased to shelter income from other sources, and
by introducing accelerated depreciation allowances for computer hardware
and software acquired to replace non Y2K-compliant hardware and software.
